alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Caddo, western Bossier Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and southeastern Marion Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mooringsport to Bossier City. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Vivian, Blanchard, Benton, Oil City, Mooringsport, Hosston, Rodessa, Belcher, Ida, Gilliam, Fosters, Eastwood, Dixie, Alden Bridge, Caddo Lake, Ferguson, Linton and Bellevue. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
